goal: Search for two highly-rated Italian restaurants in downtown Denver that have availability for a party of 4 this Saturday evening. Email the names and booking links of the two options to my executive assistant at 'alex.chen@gomail.com' so they can make the final choice. Also, put a placeholder on my calendar for Saturday at 8 PM named 'Potential Dinner Engagement'.
